about_the_game:
• "Wuxia: Founding Sects" is a card-building game set in the backdrop of martial arts themes. In this game, players will take on the role of a sect founder and enhance their own strength by practicing and creating various cards.

  • Firstly, players can also create various skills within the game. They can research and craft new skills, providing themselves with more choices and strategies in battle. These skills can offer additional attack, defense, or support effects, aiding players in gaining an advantage in combat.

  • In addition to card-building, the game also features an automatic cultivation system. Players can choose to have their characters automatically cultivate in the training ground, accumulating experience. This way, even when players are offline or busy, their characters can still automatically improve their strength, providing support during the game.

  • Furthermore, the game offers an online battle mode. Players can engage in real-time battles with other players, showcasing their own strength and strategies. During battles, players need to cleverly use their cards and skills, predict their opponent's actions, and respond accordingly to achieve victory.

  • "Wuxia: Founding Sects" provides players with a comprehensive and immersive wuxia world through its diverse card system, automatic cultivation mechanism, skill creation, and online battle mode. Players can experience unique wuxia styles in the game, showcase their intelligence and combat skills, and become true martial arts masters.
